Table of Contents

Name

runscfm - Self Consistent Field Method N-body code

Synopsis

runscfm [parameter=value]

Description

runscfm is a NEMO frontend to the scfm program. See scfm(1NEMO) for more details.

Parameters

The following parameters are recognized in any order if the keyword is also given:
in=
input file (standard snapshot)
outdir=
output run directory (required)
nsteps=
Number of timesteps
noutbod=
Output system state (on SNAPxxx)
noutlog=
Output logfile data (on SCFLOG)
dtime=
Integration timestep
gravconst=
Gravitional Constant
selfgrav=t|f
include selfgravity?
inptcoef=t|f

outpcoef=t|f

zeroodd=t|f

zeroeven=t|f

fixacc=t|f

headline=
comment line added to the run. Default: none.

Examples

See Also

scfm(1NEMO) , tabtos(1NEMO) , snapprint(1NEMO) , snapshot(5NEMO)

Author

Peter Teuben
